renderpass.code:
/* coyote - 160 chars */
#define mainImage(O,u)\
    float z = 0., g;\
    for(vec2 p = u-u-9.; ++p.x<9.; )\
        for(p.y = -9.; ++p.y<9.; ) \
            z -= g = 40.96*exp(length(p)/512.),\
            O -= g*texelFetch(iChannel0, ivec2(u+p), 0);\
    O/=z
        
/* saidwho12 - 209 chars, variable kernel size
const float N = 16., M = N*.5, S = N*N;
#define mainImage(O,u)\
    float z = 0.;\
    for(vec2 p = vec2(-M); p.x<=M; p.x++)\
        for(p.y = -M; p.y<=M; p.y++) {\
            float g = .16*S*-exp(length(p)/(2.*S) );\
            O += g*texelFetch(iChannel0, ivec2(u+p), 0);\
        	z+=g;\
        }\
    O/=z
*/
renderpass.name: Image
